service.name: git-control-tower
service.description: Centralized git repository management with structured APIs for agent-accessible version control operations

postgres.description: Metadata storage for commit history, audit logs, draft queue

redis.description: Diff snapshot caching and fsnotify invalidation

ollama.description: AI-assisted commit message generation and change analysis

resource-openrouter.description: AI fallback for commit message generation

health.description: Git Control Tower health check configuration

setup.description: Initialize Git Control Tower with database and git access

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o git-control-tower-api .

steps.name: initialize-database
steps.run: if command -v psql &> /dev/null; then psql -h ${POSTGRES_HOST:-localhost} -p ${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432} -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-vrooli} -d ${POSTGRES_DB:-vrooli} -f initialization/postgres/schema.sql 2>/dev/null || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Database schema initialization skipped (psql connection failed - run schema manually via docker exec)'; else echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Database initialization skipped (psql not available - run: docker exec vrooli-postgres-main psql -U vrooli -d vrooli -f /path/to/schema.sql)'; fi
steps.description: Run schema in shared vrooli database (optional if using containerized DB)

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run: echo "üöÄ Git Control Tower initialized" && echo "  API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}" && echo "  Health: http://localhost:${API_PORT}/health"

develop.description: Start Git Control Tower services for development

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run: echo "üöÄ Git Control Tower running" && echo "  API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}" && echo "  Health: http://localhost:${API_PORT}/health"
